title: Truffle framework is not install properly and error is shown what can i do
body:

node version (node --version): 16.14.2
npm version (npm --version): 8.5.0

Hey @hrushigawade4, this usually occurs on Windows when you don't install the extra build tools that the Node installer prompts you for. When you install Node make sure you check the box that says something about installing the extra build tools. Or you can downgrade to npm 6 which is a less ideal workaround.
Closing for issue maintenance.  If there's still a problem after trying @eggplantzzz's suggestions, let us know and we can perhaps reopen this.
